## Runtime.setTransform() method

Set the tileset transform. Make sure `updateTransforms` is set to `true` (in [LoaderOptions](./loader-3d-tiles.loaderoptions.md)<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setTransform(Matrix4: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Matrix4 | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
